noun.description: The work or vocation of a minister of religion.
examples: he is training for the ministry

noun.description: (in certain countries) a government department headed by a minister of state.
(in certain countries) a period of government under one prime minister.
The action of ministering to someone.
examples: the soldiers were no less in need of his ministry

origin: Middle English (in ministry (sense 2 of the noun)): from Latin ministerium, from minister (see minister).
